source_objects.description: Learn best practices and advice on how to create a compelling personal brand.

items.title: Personal Branding MasterClass: Build a Brand called You
items.headline: Personal Branding: Build an authentic personal brand to reach your career and / or business goals in a Brand You World.
objectives_summary: You'll get to know yourself better (strengths, points to improve, values, personality traits, etc.)
You will build a genuine personal brand, correctly perceived by those around you and in line with your true self.
You will learn everything you need to know in order to make a well-done brand communication plan (online and offline).

items.title: Make Career on YouTube for Beginners - Step by Step Process
items.headline: Complete guide to starting a YouTube channel, getting more views & subscribers, and building a brand with videos

Create your own successful YouTube channel
Make high-quality videos on a budget

How to build a powerful social network that is feeding opportunities to you

items.title: The Art of Being Found - Can your Dream Job Find You?
items.headline: If a recruiter or hiring manager searches LinkedIn to fill a job that is perfect for you, does your name come up?
objectives_summary: Students will gain an understanding of how recruiters and hiring mangers search for and screen candidates to fill their job openings. By making the recommended changes to their social profiles, job seekers will get more inbound traffic from recruiters and hiring managers seeking their skill sets.

items.title: 8 Steps To Building Your Conscious Personal Brand
items.headline: Learn to build your brand in this fully comprehensive video tutorial for greater confidence, self-mastery and success.
objectives_summary: Gain a full understanding of how you are perceived (your reputation) and the necessary tools and insights to build and manage your impact and relationships with all of your stakeholders.

Fully understand what it is that is deeply, authentically compelling about you to your target markets and audience (all stakeholders), and how to deliver consistently and effect change online, offline and in person.
(Re)connect to your purpose, values and passions and take responsibility for causing the effects you desire – elevating your confidence in the value you deliver.
